title: M.Sc. Robotic Systems Engineering at RWTH Aachen University, Aachen
description: Courses included: Advanced Robotics Kinematics and Dynamics, Computer Vision, Machine Learning, Reinforcement Learning
Awared RWTH Student Project Grant in 2023 for developing a deep learning model for Solar Soiling Detection using Aerial Vehicles.

title: Bachelors in Mechanical Engineering at PES University, Bangalore
description: Specialization in Aerospace Engineering. Courses included: Drone Computing, Propulsion, Hydraulics and Pneumatics
Awarded Merit Scholarships for Top 20% students.

Granted Patent for a concept of using multiple drones to integrate together to form one flying object to pick up heavier payloads and malfunctioning drones. Check the Publications section for the patent
